name: CenterFire - Musical DNA
description:
Musical DNA’s CenterFire™ is a Tap Along music game that lets you play along with and see the magical, hidden language of music!

Music is actually 'shapes fitting together' like pieces of a puzzle. Musical DNA® successfully reveals this beautiful puzzle — for the very first time — letting you see how music really works!

CenterFire comes with 13 songs — with multiple games per song — providing a rich, initial gameplay experience.

• Score points based on Accuracy.
• Earn Multiplier Streak Bonuses.
• Master three different types of Mini Challenges.
• Earn up to four different types of Medals per Song ‘Part’.
• Build up your musical ‘expertise’ and gradually increase your Musical Lifetime ‘Rank.’
• Keep track of your musical accomplishments in your MDNA Trophy Case.
• Work on particularly difficult game passages in the Practice Area.
• Create (and recall) any number of new CenterFire users on your device.

And MOST IMPORTANTLY — Watch all of your song parts overlap in one, Beautiful Musical Experience — in the 3D Musical DNA Viewer!

A growing catalog of music is available in our MDNA Music Store!

Every piece of music in the world — no matter the genre — no matter the style — all comes from the same, Universal Language!

Have fun exploring, and be on the lookout for a few more surprises we thought it would be best for you to discover on your own!

We hope you enjoy Musical DNA’s CenterFire and that it furthers your appreciation and understanding of our Shared Musical Language!

[If you are a musician and would like us to ‘light up’ your music in our MDNA Store, please email us at: info@musicaldna.com]
